text:
The download page http://lenya.apache.org/#download should have a link to the KEYS file http://www.apache.org/dist/lenya/KEYS.

It would also be useful if there was a description of how to check sigs and hashes.

For example, as is done by CouchDB: http://couchdb.apache.org/downloads.html - see the end of the page.

 Description  	
   The download page http://cxf.apache.org/download.html should have a link to the KEYS file http://www.apache.org/dist/cxf/KEYS. It would also be useful if there was a description of how to check sigs and hashes. For example, as is done by CouchDB: http://couchdb.apache.org/downloads.html - see the end of the page.
